verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> spake שָׁא֗וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יוֹנָתָ֤ן <S%H3129><s%> to Jonathan בְּנוֹ֙ <S%H1121><s%> his son וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲבָדָ֔יו <S%H5650><s%> and to all his servants לְהָמִ֖ית <S%H4191><s%> that they should kill אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> David וִיהֽוֹנָתָן֙ <S%H3129><s%> Jonathan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> son שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul's חָפֵ֥ץ <S%H2654><s%> delighted בְּדָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> David מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> greatly

וַיַּגֵּ֤ד <S%H5046><s%> told יְהוֹנָתָן֙ <S%H3083><s%> But Jonathan לְדָוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> in David לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying מְבַקֵּ֛שׁ <S%H1245><s%> seeketh שָׁא֥וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul's אָבִ֖י <S%H1><s%> my father לַהֲמִיתֶ֑ךָ <S%H4191><s%> to kill וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> Now הִשָּֽׁמֶר־ <S%H8104><s%> thee now therefore I pray thee take heed נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> please בַבֹּ֔קֶר <S%H1242><s%> to thyself until the morning וְיָשַׁבְתָּ֥ <S%H3427><s%> and abide בַסֵּ֖תֶר <S%H5643><s%> in a secret וְנַחְבֵּֽאתָ׃ <S%H2244><s%> [place] and hide

וַאֲנִ֨י <S%H589><s%> I אֵצֵ֜א <S%H3318><s%> And I will go out וְעָמַדְתִּ֣י <S%H5975><s%> and stand לְיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> beside אָבִ֗י <S%H1><s%> my father בַּשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> in the field אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> you שָׁ֔ם <S%H8033><s%> in it וַאֲנִ֕י <S%H589><s%> I אֲדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> where thou [art] and I will commune בְּךָ֖ אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> with אָבִ֑י <S%H1><s%> with my father וְרָאִ֥יתִי <S%H7200><s%> I see מָ֖ה <S%H4100><s%> of thee and what וְהִגַּ֥דְתִּי <S%H5046><s%> that I will tell לָֽךְ׃ ס

וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוֹנָתָ֤ן <S%H3083><s%> And Jonathan בְּדָוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> of David ט֔וֹב <S%H2896><s%> good אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> unto Saul אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> his father וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵ֠לָיו <S%H413><s%> about אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay יֶחֱטָ֨א <S%H2398><s%> sin הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> unto him Let not the king בְּעַבְדּ֣וֹ <S%H5650><s%> against his servant בְדָוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> against David כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> since ל֤וֹא <S%H3808><s%> has not חָטָא֙ <S%H2398><s%> because he hath not sinned לָ֔ךְ וְכִ֥י <S%H3588><s%> and since מַעֲשָׂ֖יו <S%H4639><s%> against thee and because his works טוֹב־ <S%H2896><s%> good לְךָ֥ מְאֹֽד׃ <S%H3966><s%> [have been] to thee-ward very

וַיָּשֶׂם֩ <S%H7760><s%> For he did put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשׁ֨וֹ <S%H5315><s%> his life בְכַפּ֜וֹ <S%H3709><s%> in his hand וַיַּ֣ךְ <S%H5221><s%> and slew אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַפְּלִשְׁתִּ֗י <S%H6430><s%> the Philistine וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> wrought יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> and the LORD תְּשׁוּעָ֤ה <S%H8668><s%> salvation גְדוֹלָה֙ <S%H1419><s%> a great לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> for all Israel רָאִ֖יתָ <S%H7200><s%> thou sawest וַתִּשְׂמָ֑ח <S%H8055><s%> [it] and didst rejoice וְלָ֤מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why תֶֽחֱטָא֙ <S%H2398><s%> wherefore then wilt thou sin בְּדָ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> blood נָקִ֔י <S%H5355><s%> against innocent לְהָמִ֥ית <S%H4191><s%> to slay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> David חִנָּֽם׃ <S%H2600><s%> without

וַיִּשְׁמַ֥ע <S%H8085><s%> hearkened שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul בְּק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> unto the voice יְהוֹנָתָ֑ן <S%H3083><s%> of Jonathan וַיִּשָּׁבַ֣ע <S%H7650><s%> sware שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> and Saul חַי־ <S%H2416><s%> liveth יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> [As] the LORD אִם־ <S%H518><s%> he shall not יוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> be slain

וַיִּקְרָ֤א <S%H7121><s%> called יְהוֹנָתָן֙ <S%H3083><s%> And Jonathan לְדָוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> David וַיַּגֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> shewed לוֹ֙ יְה֣וֹנָתָ֔ן <S%H3083><s%> and Jonathan אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <S%H1697><s%> him all those things הָאֵ֑לֶּה <S%H428><s%> these וַיָּבֵ֨א <S%H935><s%> brought יְהוֹנָתָ֤ן <S%H3083><s%> And Jonathan אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> to Saul וַיְהִ֥י <S%H1961><s%> was in לְפָנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> and he was in his presence כְּאֶתְמ֥וֹל <S%H865><s%> before time שִׁלְשֽׁוֹם׃ <S%H8032><s%> before that time ס

וַתּ֥וֹסֶף <S%H3254><s%> again הַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> And there was war לִֽהְי֑וֹת <S%H1961><s%> become וַיֵּצֵ֨א <S%H3318><s%> went out דָוִ֜ד <S%H1732><s%> and David וַיִּלָּ֣חֶם <S%H3898><s%> and fought בַּפְּלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <S%H6430><s%> with the Philistines וַיַּ֤ךְ <S%H5221><s%> and slew בָּהֶם֙ מַכָּ֣ה <S%H4347><s%> slaughter גְדוֹלָ֔ה <S%H1419><s%> them with a great וַיָּנֻ֖סוּ <S%H5127><s%> and they fled מִפָּנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> from

וַתְּהִי֩ <S%H1961><s%> become ר֨וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> spirit יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD רָעָה֙ <S%H7451><s%> And the evil אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> was upon Saul וְהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he בְּבֵית֣וֹ <S%H1004><s%> in his house יוֹשֵׁ֔ב <S%H3427><s%> as he sat וַחֲנִית֖וֹ <S%H2595><s%> with his javelin בְּיָד֑וֹ <S%H3027><s%> in his hand וְדָוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> and David מְנַגֵּ֥ן <S%H5059><s%> played בְּיָֽד׃ <S%H3027><s%> with [his] hand

וַיְבַקֵּ֨שׁ <S%H1245><s%> sought שָׁא֜וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul לְהַכּ֤וֹת <S%H5221><s%> to smite בַּֽחֲנִית֙ <S%H2595><s%> with the javelin בְּדָוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> David וּבַקִּ֔יר <S%H7023><s%> even to the wall וַיִּפְטַר֙ <S%H6362><s%> but he slipped away מִפְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> presence שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> out of Saul's וַיַּ֥ךְ <S%H5221><s%> and he smote אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַחֲנִ֖ית <S%H2595><s%> the javelin בַּקִּ֑יר <S%H7023><s%> into the wall וְדָוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> and David נָ֥ס <S%H5127><s%> fled וַיִּמָּלֵ֖ט <S%H4422><s%> and escaped בַּלַּ֥יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> that night הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he פ

וַיִּשְׁלַח֩ <S%H7971><s%> also sent שָׁא֨וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul מַלְאָכִ֜ים <S%H4397><s%> messengers אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about בֵּ֤ית <S%H1004><s%> house דָּוִד֙ <S%H1732><s%> unto David's לְשָׁמְר֔וֹ <S%H8104><s%> to watch וְלַהֲמִית֖וֹ <S%H4191><s%> him and to slay בַּבֹּ֑קֶר <S%H1242><s%> him in the morning וַתַּגֵּ֣ד <S%H5046><s%> told לְדָוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> David's מִיכַ֤ל <S%H4324><s%> and Michal אִשְׁתּוֹ֙ <S%H802><s%> wife לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> him saying אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If אֵ֨ינְךָ֜ <S%H369><s%> not מְמַלֵּ֤ט <S%H4422><s%> If thou save אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> נַפְשְׁךָ֙ <S%H5315><s%> not thy life הַלַּ֔יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> to night מָחָ֖ר <S%H4279><s%> to morrow אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> him מוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> thou shalt be slain

וַתֹּ֧רֶד <S%H3381><s%> down מִיכַ֛ל <S%H4324><s%> So Michal אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> David בְּעַ֣ד <S%H1157><s%> through הַחַלּ֑וֹן <S%H2474><s%> through a window וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went וַיִּבְרַ֖ח <S%H1272><s%> and fled וַיִּמָּלֵֽט׃ <S%H4422><s%> and escaped

וַתִּקַּ֨ח <S%H3947><s%> took מִיכַ֜ל <S%H4324><s%> And Michal אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַתְּרָפִ֗ים <S%H8655><s%> an image וַתָּ֙שֶׂם֙ <S%H7760><s%> and laid אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַמִּטָּ֔ה <S%H4296><s%> [it] in the bed וְאֵת֙ <S%H853><s%> כְּבִ֣יר <S%H3523><s%> a pillow הָֽעִזִּ֔ים <S%H5795><s%> of goats' שָׂ֖מָה <S%H7760><s%> and put מְרַֽאֲשֹׁתָ֑יו <S%H4763><s%> [hair] for his bolster וַתְּכַ֖ס <S%H3680><s%> and covered בַּבָּֽגֶד׃ <S%H899><s%> [it] with a cloth ס

וַיִּשְׁלַ֥ח <S%H7971><s%> sent שָׁא֛וּל <S%H7586><s%> And when Saul מַלְאָכִ֖ים <S%H4397><s%> messengers לָקַ֣חַת <S%H3947><s%> to take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> David וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> she said חֹלֶ֥ה <S%H2470><s%> He [is] sick הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he פ

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <S%H7971><s%> sent שָׁאוּל֙ <S%H7586><s%> And Saul אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמַּלְאָכִ֔ים <S%H4397><s%> the messengers לִרְא֥וֹת <S%H7200><s%> [again] to see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דָּוִ֖ד <S%H1732><s%> David לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying הַעֲל֨וּ <S%H5927><s%> Bring him up אֹת֧וֹ <S%H853><s%> בַמִּטָּ֛ה <S%H4296><s%> to me in the bed אֵלַ֖י <S%H413><s%> about לַהֲמִתֽוֹ׃ <S%H4191><s%> that I may slay

וַיָּבֹ֙אוּ֙ <S%H935><s%> were come in הַמַּלְאָכִ֔ים <S%H4397><s%> And when the messengers וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> behold הַתְּרָפִ֖ים <S%H8655><s%> behold [there was] an image אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> on הַמִּטָּ֑ה <S%H4296><s%> in the bed וּכְבִ֥יר <S%H3523><s%> with a pillow הָעִזִּ֖ים <S%H5795><s%> of goats' מְרַאֲשֹׁתָֽיו׃ <S%H4763><s%> [hair] for his bolster

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said שָׁא֜וּל <S%H7586><s%> And Saul אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מִיכַ֗ל <S%H4324><s%> unto Michal לָ֤מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why כָּ֙כָה֙ <S%H3602><s%> like רִמִּיתִ֔נִי <S%H7411><s%> Why hast thou deceived me so וַתְּשַׁלְּחִ֥י <S%H7971><s%> and sent away אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֹיְבִ֖י <S%H341><s%> mine enemy וַיִּמָּלֵ֑ט <S%H4422><s%> that he is escaped וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> answered מִיכַל֙ <S%H4324><s%> ? And Michal אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> Saul הוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> He אָמַ֥ר <S%H559><s%> He said אֵלַ֛י <S%H413><s%> about שַׁלְּחִ֖נִי <S%H7971><s%> unto me Let me go לָמָ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> Why אֲמִיתֵֽךְ׃ <S%H4191><s%> why should I kill

וְדָוִ֨ד <S%H1732><s%> So David בָּרַ֜ח <S%H1272><s%> fled וַיִּמָּלֵ֗ט <S%H4422><s%> and escaped וַיָּבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> and came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to שְׁמוּאֵל֙ <S%H8050><s%> to Samuel הָרָמָ֔תָה <S%H7414><s%> to Ramah וַיַּ֨גֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> and told ל֔וֹ אֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after עָֽשָׂה־ <S%H6213><s%> had done ל֖וֹ שָׁא֑וּל <S%H7586><s%> him all that Saul וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> went הוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> and he וּשְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <S%H8050><s%> to him And he and Samuel וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ <S%H3427><s%> and dwelt [בְּנֹוִית כ] (בְּנָֽיֹות׃ <S%H5121><s%> Naioth ק)
